item.description:
This is a last minute idea if anyone is up for joining Carol and me for lunch and a hike after on the Midstate Trail to Muddy Pond, we'd love to have you!

Monty Tech's Mountain Room Restaurant(can check daily menu. I think it's updated after 10am each day):

http://fm.montytech.net/fmi/iwp/cgi?-db=MR-menu&-loadframes

We'll be hiking in from Bragg Hill Road. The hike in will be approximately 3.73 miles round trip and about 1 1/2 hours round trip from that point to Muddy Pond but we can hike further if we choose to.
item.how_to_find_us: Entrance in rear of School on right side. Will be waiting in the lobby. Also I drive a maroon Chevy Monte Carlo.

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Lunch at Monty Tech School's Restaurant/Muddy Pond Hike
